meta.title: Cookie Policy - Fredonbytes
meta.description: Learn about how Fredonbytes uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized services.

header.title: Cookie Policy
header.subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies

overview.title: Cookie Overview
overview.description: This policy explains how Fredonbytes uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website, and your choices regarding these technologies.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your visit, which can make it easier to visit the site again and make the site more useful to you.
whatAreCookies.description2: We also use similar technologies such as web beacons, pixels, and local storage, which we collectively refer to as "cookies" in this policy.

essential.title: üîß Essential Cookies
essential.purpose: Purpose: Required for basic website functionality
essential.canDisable: Can be disabled: No - these are necessary for the site to work
essential.description: These cookies enable core functionality such as page navigation, access to secure areas, and remembering your cookie preferences.

analytics.title: üìä Analytics Cookies
analytics.purpose: Purpose: Help us understand website usage
analytics.canDisable: Can be disabled: Yes - through our cookie banner
analytics.description: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often.

marketing.title: üéØ Marketing Cookies
marketing.canDisable: Can be disabled: Yes - through our cookie banner
marketing.description: These cookies track your browsing habits to show you relevant ads and measure advertising effectiveness.

preference.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Preference Cookies
preference.purpose: Purpose: Remember your settings and preferences
preference.canDisable: Can be disabled: Yes - through our cookie banner
preference.description: These cookies remember your preferences such as language, region, or theme settings for a personalized experience.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.description: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We use the following third-party services:

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: Helps us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

googleFonts.title: Google Fonts
googleFonts.description: Provides web fonts to enhance the visual design of our website.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Platforms
socialMedia.description: When you interact with social media buttons or embedded content, those platforms may set their own cookies.
socialMedia.note: Please refer to the respective privacy policies of each platform.

cookieBanner.title: Our Cookie Banner
cookieBanner.description: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie banner that allows you to:
options: Learn more about each type of cookie

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.description: You can also control cookies through your browser settings:
browsers: Chrome: Settings ‚Üí Privacy and security ‚Üí Cookies and other site data
Firefox: Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Cookies and Site Data
Safari: Preferences ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Manage Website Data
Edge: Settings ‚Üí Cookies and site permissions ‚Üí Cookies and site data

optOutLinks.title: Opt-Out Links
optOutLinks.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics: Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on

impactOfDisabling.title: 6. Impact of Disabling Cookies
impactOfDisabling.description: If you choose to disable certain cookies, some features of our website may not function properly:
impacts: You may need to re-enter information on each visit
Some personalized features may not be available
You may see less relevant advertisements

updates.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, regulatory, or operational reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

changePreferences.title: üç™ Need to Change Your Cookie Preferences?
changePreferences.description: You can update your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the cookie settings button in the bottom corner of any page on our website.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Fredonbytes
meta.description: Learn how Fredonbytes collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Our comprehensive privacy policy explains your rights and our data practices.

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.description: We may collect the following personal information when you contact us or use our services:
items: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
Company information and job title
Project requirements and preferences
Communication history and correspondence

technicalInformation.title: Technical Information
technicalInformation.description: We automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our website:
items: IP address and browser type
Device information and operating system
Pages visited and time spent on our site
Referral source and exit pages

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
purposes: To respond to your inquiries and provide our services
To communicate with you about your projects
To improve our website and services
To send you newsletters and updates (with your consent)

cookiesTracking.title: 3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookiesTracking.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website functionality and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure campaign effectiveness.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
circumstances: With trusted service providers who assist in delivering our services
When required by law or to protect our legal rights
In connection with a business transfer or acquisition

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
measures: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Staff training on data protection practices

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
rights: Access: Request copies of your personal data
Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data
Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
Portability: Request transfer of your data
Objection: Object to processing of your data

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law. Generally, we retain client information for 7 years after the completion of services for business and legal purposes.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: As we are based in the Czech Republic (EU), your data is processed within the European Economic Area. Any transfers outside the EEA will be subject to appropriate safeguards and legal protections.

updates.title: 9. Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

questions.title: Questions?
questions.description: We're committed to transparency and protecting your privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about how we handle your data, don't hesitate to reach out to us.

meta.title: Terms of Service - Fredonbytes
meta.description: Read our terms of service to understand the legal framework governing the use of Fredonbytes services and website.

header.title: Terms of Service
header.subtitle: Legal terms governing the use of our services

agreementOverview.title: Agreement Overview
agreementOverview.description: By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.description1: By accessing or using the Fredonbytes website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptanceOfTerms.description2: These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our services.

servicesDescription.title: 2. Services Description
servicesDescription.description: Fredonbytes provides comprehensive IT solutions including:
services: Graphic design and brand identity services

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: When using our services, you agree to:
responsibilities: Use our services for lawful purposes only
Not engage in harmful or disruptive activities
Maintain the confidentiality of any login credentials

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.description: You may not use our services to:
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon the rights of others
Distribute malware or harmful code
Engage in unauthorized data collection
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems

serviceAgreements.title: 4. Service Agreements and Contracts
serviceAgreements.description: Specific projects and services will be governed by separate written agreements that detail:
serviceAgreements.note: In case of conflict between these Terms of Service and a specific service agreement, the service agreement shall prevail.

pricingInvoicing.title: Pricing and Invoicing
items: All prices are quoted in USD or EUR as specified
Invoices are payable within 30 days of issue date
Late payments may incur additional charges
We reserve the right to suspend services for overdue accounts

refundsCancellations.title: Refunds and Cancellations
items: Refund policies are specified in individual service agreements
Work completed prior to cancellation is non-refundable
Cancellation requests must be submitted in writing
Custom development work may have different cancellation terms

ourProperty.title: Our Intellectual Property
ourProperty.description: The Fredonbytes website, logo, content, and methodologies are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.

clientProperty.title: Client Intellectual Property
clientProperty.description: Ownership of deliverables and intellectual property created for clients will be specified in the relevant service agreement. Generally, clients retain ownership of their content and branding materials, while custom development may involve shared or transferred ownership rights.

confidentiality.title: 7. Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: We understand the importance of protecting confidential information. We commit to:
commitments: Maintaining strict confidentiality of client information
Using client information only for authorized purposes
Not disclosing confidential information to third parties
Returning or destroying confidential information upon request

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: While we strive for high availability, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access to our website or services. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue services with reasonable notice.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific service giving rise to the claim. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or business opportunities.

dataProtectionPrivacy.title: 9. Data Protection and Privacy
dataProtectionPrivacy.description1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR. Our data practices are detailed in our Privacy Policy, which forms an integral part of these terms.
dataProtectionPrivacy.description2: By using our services, you consent to the collection, use, and processing of your data as described in our Privacy Policy.

governingLawDisputes.title: 10. Governing Law and Disputes
governingLawDisputes.description1: These terms are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic. Any disputes arising from these terms or our services will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Brno, Czech Republic.
governingLawDisputes.description2: We encourage resolving disputes through direct communication before pursuing legal action.

changesToTerms.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.description1: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting on our website. We will notify users of material changes via email or website notice.
changesToTerms.description2: Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.description: Either party may terminate the service relationship with appropriate notice as specified in the relevant service agreement. Upon termination:
consequences: All outstanding invoices become immediately due
Access to our services and systems will be revoked
Data return or destruction will be handled as agreed

contact.title: 13. Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.description: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please discontinue use of our website and services immediately.
